subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Floods
lead_paragraph: Only at the United States Open could a top professional golfer like Vijay Singh make this statement just after shooting a seven-over-par 78: “I still played really well.”
snippet: Only at the United States Open could a top professional golfer like Vijay Singh make this statement just after shooting a seven-over-par 78: “I still played really well.”
